title: Awesome List Updates on Mar 18, 2025
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Mar 18, 2025 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Flame
items.content_text:
### Open Source / Casual

*   [Antimine - Minesweeper (‚≠ê6)](https://github.com/lucasnlm/antimine-flutter) - Antimine is a minesweeper-like puzzle game. The objective is to flag the spaces with mines to make the field a safer place without exploding any of them. Get it on [Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.logical.minato). By [lucasnlm](https://github.com/lucasnlm).
items.content_html:
Open Source / Casual

  • Antimine - Minesweeper (‚≠ê6) - Antimine is a minesweeper-like puzzle game. The objective is to flag the spaces with mines to make the field a safer place without exploding any of them. Get it on Google Play. By lucasnlm.

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### HTTP / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-sse-client (‚≠ê32)](https://github.com/marcospds/ngx-sse-client) - A simple **SSE** (Server Sent Events) client for Angular applications to replace the use of `EventSource`.

### Paid / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [NgFast](https://ngfast.com/) - The Angular boilerplate for building SaaS, landing pages, and web apps fast‚Äîturning your ideas into income.

### Captcha / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ng-cloudflare-turnstile (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/pangz-lab/ng-cloudflare-turnstile) - An intuitive, lightweight and easy to integrate [Cloudflare turnstile](https://developers.cloudflare.com/turnstile/) component for Angular.

### Loaders / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ng-loading-skeleton (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/arbrim/ng-loading-skeleton) - A lightweight and customizable Angular loading skeleton component.

### Unspecified / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [Vega](https://vega.hlprd.com/) - Vega includes reusable components and styles, in your framework of choice. Build product features faster, without recreating the same basic components for every project.
items.content_html:
HTTP / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-sse-client (‚≠ê32) - A simple SSE (Server Sent Events) client for Angular applications to replace the use of EventSource.

Paid / Google Developer Experts

  • NgFast - The Angular boilerplate for building SaaS, landing pages, and web apps fast‚Äîturning your ideas into income.

Captcha / Google Developer Experts

  • ng-cloudflare-turnstile (‚≠ê3) - An intuitive, lightweight and easy to integrate Cloudflare turnstile component for Angular.

Loaders / Google Developer Experts

  • ng-loading-skeleton (‚≠ê3) - A lightweight and customizable Angular loading skeleton component.

Unspecified / Google Developer Experts

  • Vega - Vega includes reusable components and styles, in your framework of choice. Build product features faster, without recreating the same basic components for every project.

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Maps and Global Positioning System (GPS)

*   [wanderer (‚≠ê2.3k)](https://github.com/Flomp/wanderer) - Trail database where you can upload your recorded tracks or create new ones and add various metadata to build an easily searchable catalogue. ([Demo](https://demo.wanderer.to)) `AGPL-3.0` `Docker/Go/Nodejs`

### Software / Miscellaneous

*   [ConvertX (‚≠ê2.9k)](https://github.com/C4illin/ConvertX) - Online file converter which supports over a thousand different formats. `AGPL-3.0` `Docker`

### Software / Password Managers

*   [AliasVault](https://www.aliasvault.net) - End-to-end encrypted password manager with a built-in email alias generator and server. ([Source Code (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault)) `MIT` `Docker`

### Software / Software Development - Low Code

*   [TrailBase](https://trailbase.io/) - Open, sub-millisecond, single-executable FireBase alternative with type-safe REST & realtime APIs, built-in JS/TS runtime, auth & admin UI. ([Demo](https://demo.trailbase.io), [Source Code (‚≠ê2.6k)](https://github.com/trailbaseio/trailbase)) `OSL-3.0` `Rust/Docker`

### Software / URL Shorteners

*   [clink](https://git.swurl.xyz/swirl/clink.git/about/) - A super-minimal link shortening service written in pure C, focusing on small executable size, portability, and ease of configuration. ([Demo](https://short.swurl.xyz), [Source Code](https://git.swurl.xyz/swirl/clink.git)) `AGPL-3.0` `C`
items.content_html:
Software / Maps and Global Positioning System (GPS)

  • wanderer (‚≠ê2.3k) - Trail database where you can upload your recorded tracks or create new ones and add various metadata to build an easily searchable catalogue. (Demo) AGPL-3.0 Docker/Go/Nodejs

Software / Miscellaneous

  • ConvertX (‚≠ê2.9k) - Online file converter which supports over a thousand different formats. AGPL-3.0 Docker

Software / Password Managers

  • AliasVault - End-to-end encrypted password manager with a built-in email alias generator and server. (Source Code (‚≠ê1.1k)) MIT Docker

Software / Software Development - Low Code

  • TrailBase - Open, sub-millisecond, single-executable FireBase alternative with type-safe REST & realtime APIs, built-in JS/TS runtime, auth & admin UI. (Demo, Source Code (‚≠ê2.6k)) OSL-3.0 Rust/Docker

Software / URL Shorteners

  • clink - A super-minimal link shortening service written in pure C, focusing on small executable size, portability, and ease of configuration. (Demo, Source Code) AGPL-3.0 C

items.title: Awesome Polars
items.content_text:
### Blog posts / Miscellaneous

*   [The Complete Guide to Polars for Data Science](https://noroinsight.com/polars-for-data-science-complete-guide/) - A hands-on tutorial that teaches how to load, manipulate, transform and optimize data sets with Polars in Python by [@norochalise](https://github.com/norochalise). Code used is available on Github [here (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/norochalise/noroinsight-polars-tutorial).
items.content_html:
Blog posts / Miscellaneous

  • The Complete Guide to Polars for Data Science - A hands-on tutorial that teaches how to load, manipulate, transform and optimize data sets with Polars in Python by @norochalise. Code used is available on Github here (‚≠ê1).

items.title: Awesome Mysql
items.content_text:
### Security

*   [myldapsync (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/6eh01der/myldapsync) - Synchronize MySQL or MariaDB users with users in an LDAP directory.
items.content_html:
Security

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### Language / Diagnostics

*   [kiyoon/Korean-IME.nvim (‚≠ê24)](https://github.com/kiyoon/Korean-IME.nvim) - OS-independent Korean input method that converts English inputs to Korean in-place.

### Bars and Lines / Diagnostics

*   [OXY2DEV/bars.nvim (‚≠ê78)](https://github.com/OXY2DEV/bars.nvim) - A starting point/guide for creating custom statusline, statuscolumn, tabline & winbar.

### Utility / Diagnostics

*   [kiyoon/jupynium.nvim (‚≠ê651)](https://github.com/kiyoon/jupynium.nvim) - Selenium-automated Jupyter Notebook that is synchronised with Neovim in real-time.

### Tree-sitter Based / Diagnostics

*   [kiyoon/treesitter-indent-object.nvim (‚≠ê65)](https://github.com/kiyoon/treesitter-indent-object.nvim) - Context-aware indent textobject powered by Tree-sitter.

### Editing Support / Diagnostics

*   [kiyoon/telescope-insert-path.nvim (‚≠ê40)](https://github.com/kiyoon/telescope-insert-path.nvim) - Insert file path in the current buffer using Telescope.

### Tmux / Diagnostics

*   [kiyoon/tmux-send.nvim (‚≠ê11)](https://github.com/kiyoon/tmux-send.nvim) - Copy and paste buffer content or file path in Nvim-Tree, Neo-Tree, Oil to another tmux pane in Neovim.
items.content_html:
Language / Diagnostics

  • kiyoon/Korean-IME.nvim (‚≠ê24) - OS-independent Korean input method that converts English inputs to Korean in-place.

Bars and Lines / Diagnostics

  • OXY2DEV/bars.nvim (‚≠ê78) - A starting point/guide for creating custom statusline, statuscolumn, tabline & winbar.

Utility / Diagnostics

  • kiyoon/jupynium.nvim (‚≠ê651) - Selenium-automated Jupyter Notebook that is synchronised with Neovim in real-time.

Tree-sitter Based / Diagnostics

  • kiyoon/treesitter-indent-object.nvim (‚≠ê65) - Context-aware indent textobject powered by Tree-sitter.

Editing Support / Diagnostics

  • kiyoon/telescope-insert-path.nvim (‚≠ê40) - Insert file path in the current buffer using Telescope.

Tmux / Diagnostics

  • kiyoon/tmux-send.nvim (‚≠ê11) - Copy and paste buffer content or file path in Nvim-Tree, Neo-Tree, Oil to another tmux pane in Neovim.

items.title: Awesome Cpp
items.content_text:
### PDF

*   [QPDF (‚≠ê4.1k)](https://github.com/qpdf/qpdf) - A tool and C++ library for content-preserving transformations of PDF files. \[Apache-2.0] [website](https://qpdf.sourceforge.io/)
items.content_html:
PDF

  • QPDF (‚≠ê4.1k) - A tool and C++ library for content-preserving transformations of PDF files. [Apache-2.0] website
